page.title: 08AMENITIES and BUSINESSES.
page.content: Children attend{Luston Primary } {School;}older ones go to{Wigmore } {Comprehensive}or the{Minster School}in Leominster. There are only two public telephones a telephone exchange and four{post {boxes. } In 1981 the{population}was about 568 There is little{unemployment, }but too few youngsters and nearly 50% of all householders are retired. Most of those working commute. Two{shops still}function, one is also a{Post Office.}There is a coal yard, other businesses include a haulier, builder, carpenters, furniture maker and hair dresser; but there is a need for more craft industries to attract young families.
